page.title: 15Turvey Heritage
page.content: Anew organisation was formed in 1980 which aims topreserve the relics of the past together with a record of changes presently taking place in order to leave a complete account of village life for posterity. In doing so, it hopes to act as a pressure group to ensure that Turvey in the future is as it's inhabitants wish it to be. Turvey Heritage has restored the Parish Bier and is collecting together interesting items to form a village museum. Some items have already been on display in celebrating the Church's millenium and concerts and lace exhibitions have been held to raise funds for the Group's activities.
